name: Soracom
description: Even for cloud-fluent developers, building for IoT can present a new kind of challenge. The Soracom platform is designed to make getting started easy and to scale as you do, with more advanced services available once you’re connected. From basic connectivity to advanced cloud integration, our philosophy carries across every service we offer: make it easy and keep the developer in control. Every service is offered on a pay-as-you-go, take-what-you-need basis. Pricing is completely transparent, there’s never any contract to sign, and you can stop the service the moment you stop needing it, or someone does it better than us. Get a SIM from us or from Amazon.com and get started.

jobs.title: Europe Inside Sales Representative
jobs.description:
[About Soracom]
Soracom was founded in 2015 with a clear vision to build a more connected world. Today, Soracom serves over 15,000 customers worldwide, delivering connectivity for the Internet of Things powered by the speed and scale of the cloud. Founded by AWS veterans and headquartered in Tokyo, Soracom is now building out a team in Europe to continue the company's rapid growth.

[About the role]
You will join as a key member of the team in Europe and will have the opportunity to work with a team that is passionate about IoT and excited about the rapid growth we are seeing in the market. 
As a Senior Inside Sales Representative, you will help drive growth and develop the future of Soracom’s adoption in Europe. You will represent Soracom’s voice and be the first contact point with our customers from leads generated by marketing programs, inquiries and business development activities. You will be managing this activity through inside sales calls and emails and both deliver a pipeline to our business developers as well as take necessary steps to close deals including: learning customer’s use case and requirements, value proposition, price negotiation and customer onboarding.
 
RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE:
- Follow daily inside sales activities including customer calls and emails to develop qualified leads and close deals
- Work together business development, sales and marketing teams to develop a strategy to achieve key objectives
- Work with marketing team to attend industry events to represent Soracom, engage with potential customers and build campaigns to increase inbound leads

PROFILE:
- Candidate must be fluent in English with excellent oral and written communication skills.
- At least 3 years of hands-on experience in a technology related sales or business development role
- Self-Managed person with ability to work with remote team and take business growth and customer success decision
- Thriving to always learn new things and flexible about everyday tasks required to complete the work

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:
- Fluent in other languages
- Experience working with IoT and Cloud technologies
- Industry contacts in the IoT field

Location
London is the preferred location however given the right fit, this role can be remote based. In both cases the candidate is expected to travel at times.
